transcript: I mean you can take those things out of a war but when you drive that car you've got to know that it came out of the love a man can have for a man Gotta be a little better because of it

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I mean, you can take those things out of a war, but when you drive that car, you've gotta know that it came out of the love a man can have for a man.  You've gotta be a little better because of it.
